definitions.definition: Fluent or having a ready flow of speech .
labels: of a person or a manner of speaking
definitions.label_groups: of a person or a manner of speaking

definitions.definition: Of thoughts, feelings, or something that is expressed: expressed readily or at length and in a fluent manner.
Easily rolling or turning; having a fluid , undulating motion.
Twisting and turning like a vine .

main_definition: ( of a person or a manner of speaking ) Fluent or having a ready flow of speech .
secondary_definitions: Of thoughts, feelings, or something that is expressed: expressed readily or at length and in a fluent manner.
Easily rolling or turning; having a fluid , undulating motion.
( botany ) Twisting and turning like a vine .
